import { ColorItem, ColorPalette, Meta } from "@storybook/blocks";
import { themes, themeVariables } from "@/shared/constants";

export const ThemeColors = ({ extension, theme }) => {
  return (
    <div
      style={{ marginBottom: "3rem" }}
      data-extension={extension.toLowerCase()}
      data-theme={theme.toLowerCase()}
    >
      <h3 id={`${extension}-${theme}`}>
        {extension} {theme}
      </h3>

      <ColorPalette>
        {
          themeVariables.map((variable) => (
            <ColorItem
              key={variable}
              title={variable}
              subtitle="Custom color"
              colors={{
                [variable]: `rgb(var(--${variable}))`,
              }}
            />
          ))
        }
      </ColorPalette>
    </div>
  );
};

export const RenderAllThemes = () => (
  <>
    {
      themes.map(({ extension, name }) => (
        <ThemeColors
          key={`${extension}-${name}`}
          extension={extension}
          theme={name}
        />
      ))
    }
  </>
);

<Meta title="Theme/Colors" />

<RenderAllThemes />
